\hypertarget{classWindow}{}\doxysection{Window Class Reference}
\label{classWindow}\index{Window@{Window}}


this class represents a single window, there should only ever be one if the app is in opengl mode.  




{\ttfamily \#include $<$window.\+hpp$>$}

\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
this class represents a single window, there should only ever be one if the app is in opengl mode.
